citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:30 - 11:00
am on 07/28/2016.
Inspector arrived at facility, knocked on residence door, honked GOV horn, called listed phone number with no
response.
